languages.text: "Теперь все ясно. Здесь была битва, и, готовясь к ней, наставник Амарнат запретил посторонним вход в обсерваториум".
"Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits."
languages.original_text: "Теперь все ясно. Здесь была битва, и, готовясь к ней, наставник Амарнат запретил посторонним вход в обсерваториум".

traits.locale_text: "Now everything is clear. "A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat had declared the observatorium off limits."
"Now everything is clear. "A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat had declared the observatorium off limits."
"Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat had declared the observatorium off limits."

"Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits."
"Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits."

languages.text: 「ようやくすべてが明らかになった。戦闘がここで行われ、その準備の間にアマルナトは観測所を立入禁止にした」
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits."

traits.locale_text: 「ようやくすべてが明らかになった。戦闘がここで行われ、その準備の間にアマルナトは観測所を立入禁止にした」

languages.text: “如今一切都一目了然，这里曾发生过一场战斗。在准备战斗的过程中，阿玛纳特宣布关闭瞭望台。”
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits."

traits.locale_text: “如今一切都一目了然，这里曾发生过一场战斗。在准备战斗的过程中，阿玛纳特宣布关闭瞭望台。”

languages.text: « Tout est clair maintenant. Une bataille a eu lieu, et, pendant les préparatifs, Amarnat a interdit l'accès à l'observatorium. »
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits."

traits.locale_text: « Tout est clair maintenant. Une bataille a eu lieu, et, pendant les préparatifs, Amarnat a interdit l'accès à l'observatorium. »

languages.text: «Ahora está claro. Aquí ha habido un combate, y mientras se preparaban, Amarnat prohibió la entrada al observatorium».
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora está claro. Aquí ha habido un combate, y mientras se preparaban, Amarnat prohibió la entrada al observatorium».

languages.text: "Nun ist alles klar. Hier wurde ein Kampf ausgetragen, und während der Vorbereitungen darauf hat Amarnat das Observatorium zum Sperrgebiet erklärt."
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits."

traits.locale_text: "Nun ist alles klar. Hier wurde ein Kampf ausgetragen, und während der Vorbereitungen darauf hat Amarnat das Observatorium zum Sperrgebiet erklärt."

languages.text: "Şimdi her şey netleşti. Burada bir muharebe yaşanmış. Ona hazırlık yapılırken Amarnat, gözlemhaneye girişin yasak olduğunu ilan etmiş."
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi her şey netleşti. Burada bir çatışma gerçekleşmiş ve ona hazırlık yapılırken Amarnat, gözlemhaneye girişin yasak olduğunu ilan etmiş."
